texts.name: Shakti
texts.biography: Though eyeless, Shakti has amazing vision when it comes to battlefield tactics.  His Troglodyte hordes are feared the world over, especially in the dark tunnels of Nighon.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Troglodytes or Infernal Troglodytes for each level attained after 1st level.
specialty.name: Troglodytes
